p: The relationship between CSMD1 gene polymorphisms and PD sensitivity has already been investigated in some countries, but not China. In consequence, we conducted a case-control study to explore the risk relevance between three SNPs (rs12681349, rs10503253, and rs1983474) of CSMD1 gene with PD in Northern Chinese aiming to provide new insights into the pathogenesis of PD and generate ideas for early diagnosis and treatment of PD.
